scripts.lint: cd packages/druyan && yarn run lint && cd ../druyan-react && yarn run lint
scripts.lerna:publish: yarn build && lerna publish from-package --contents pkg
scripts.nuke: lerna exec "rm -f package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json" && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap && lerna exec --stream -- "test -f package-lock.json || npm install --package-lock-only"
